title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document functional requirements, non-functional requirements, and business requirements for the MultilingualMaster system.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Develop the overall system architecture for the MultilingualMaster application, including frontend, backend, and database design.

title: Develop Frontend Interface
description: Create the user interface for the MultilingualMaster application, allowing users to manage translations and settings.

title: Develop Backend Services
description: Create the backend services to handle translation requests and manage user data.

title: Create Translation Workflow
description: Establish a workflow for translators to receive, review, and submit translations within the system.

title: Implement Translation Management UI
description: Develop the user interface for translators to manage their tasks, submit translations, and view translation statuses.

title: Configure Database Schema
description: Design and implement the database schema to store translations, users, and other relevant data.

title: Set Up Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD)
description: Configure the CI/CD pipeline to automate the testing, building, and deployment of application changes.

title: Perform Unit Tests
description: Develop and execute unit tests for the application to ensure proper functionality and code coverage.

title: Perform Integration Tests
description: Execute integration tests to verify the functionality and compatibility between the frontend, backend, and database components.

title: Conduct System Testing
description: Execute system-level testing to ensure that the MultilingualMaster application meets all requirements and performs as expected.

title: Fix Identified Issues
description: Address any issues discovered during testing and re-test to ensure the resolution.

title: Secure the Application
description: Implement security measures to protect user data and prevent unauthorized access.

title: Document the Application
description: Create technical documentation for the MultilingualMaster system, including API references and user guides.

title: Deploy the MultilingualMaster System
description: Prepare the application for production deployment, ensuring proper configuration and testing.
